title_short: An arjī re Raṇajit Siṃ's failure to gain victory

document_metadata.Title:: An arjī from Jasapāu Thāpā re Raṇajit Siṃ's failure to gain victory (VS 1871)
document_metadata.Abstract:: It is the letter of Jaspāu Thāpā from Arkī to authority concerned stating about the war in which Raṇvīra Simha was unable to get victory.
document_metadata.Source and details:: NGMPP catalogue card; Microfilmed on 22/02/2000 as NGMPP DNA 1/21

terms.meaning: var. uprāṃta, ūprāṃnta, ūprā̃nta, prāṃta; also yathocita uprānta; conj. after that, besides, in addition to, hereafter. In earlier prose and official documents, this word marked the beginning of a text or paragraph. It has no equivalent in English (Clark 1989: 231). In some (mostly Rāṇā period?) documents, it takes the form of yathocita uprānta. t.t.
var. arji; n. 1) request, petition, application. 2) a respectful letter to a superior authority, especially the king. t.t.
